mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspStrnd Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ STRND_SN , STRND_TP_CD , STRND_NM , STRND_DSCR , DSP_BEG_DT , DSP_END_DT , DSP_YN , SORT_SEQ , BRND_ID , SESON_CD , RPRST_IMG_FILE_NM , RPRST_IMG_FILE_URL , RPRST_IMG_ALTRTV_CONT , RPRST_IMG2_FILE_NM , RPRST_IMG2_FILE_URL , RPRST_IMG2_ALTRTV_CONT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_STRND WHERE 1 = 1 AND STRND_SN = #{strndSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteDspStrnd Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM DSP_STRND WHERE 1 = 1 AND STRND_SN = #{strndSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
